text: Glogovac (Serbian Cyrillic: Глоговац ) is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Bogatić municipality, in the Mačva District. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and its population numbering 967 people (2002 census). ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *Mačva Category:Mačva Category:Populated places in Mačva District
title: Glogovac, Bogatić
